messages.subject: Call to single unschooling Moms (OT)
messages.msgSnippet: I have a friend that is trying to get started on her own as a new single parent, and is looking for other single unschooling Mums to create a co-housing
messages.messageBody:
I have a friend that is trying to get started on her own as a new
single parent, and is looking for other single unschooling Mums to
create a co-housing opportunity.

Here's the info:

A few moms are gathering to share housing and childcare in the Johnson
City/Jonesborough TN area. Have your own bedroom, with access to all
the common living/ eating/ laundry areas in one large house and share
rent, expenses and childcare that supports unschooling philosophies.
Are there are other single moms who need a place? Please email
offlist at and I'll forward it to the person that is organizing this.
(starsuncloud@...)

Thanks everyone,
Ren
learninginfreedom.com
